summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department and providing for the conveyance of certain property within Government Lots 4 and 5, Section 31, Township 37 North, Range 12 East, W.M., in Whatcom County Washington, to the State of Washington, Department of Transportation, and accepting a granted easement, in lieu of a reserved easement over a portion of said property (P.M. \#371231-2-301 & 001).
